speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0478/2006 ) by Anna Záborská, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on gender mainstreaming in the work of the committees ( 2005/2149(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0478/2006 ) by Anna Záborská, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on gender mainstreaming in the work of the committees ( 2005/2149(INI) ).
agenda_item: Equality between men and women in the committees' work (debate)
